plugin-data.name: Floating Image
plugin-data.description: Display a customizable floating image (GIF/PNG) on your website that can be closed by double-clicking

image-url-help: Enter the URL of your image (GIF or PNG)
image-size-help: Set the width of the image in pixels
position-x-help: Horizontal position (left, center, right, or custom % value)
position-y-help: Vertical position (top, middle, bottom, or custom % value)
z-index-help: Layer order (higher number = front, lower = back)
opacity-help: Image transparency (0.1 to 1.0, where 1.0 is fully opaque)
